summary: Implements a sort‑pooling layer that orders node feature vectors of a graph (or a batch of graphs) by their values, extracts the features of the top‑k ranked nodes, and concatenates them into a fixed‑length representation suitable for graph‑level tasks.
business_intent: Provides a deterministic, size‑invariant pooling mechanism to transform variable‑sized graph data into a uniform feature vector, enabling downstream classification or regression models in graph neural network pipelines.
